resume_text:
NAME: George Ingram
EMAIL: george.ingram@email.com
PHONE: (555) 456-7891

SUMMARY:
A highly adaptable Security Engineer adept at identifying and mitigating security vulnerabilities. Experienced in penetration testing, incident response, and security policy implementation.

SKILLS:
Python, AWS, Linux, Network Security, Penetration Testing, Incident Response

EXPERIENCE:
CyberGuard Services - Security Engineer (2017 - Present)
- Conducted regular penetration tests on web applications and infrastructure.
- Responded to security incidents and implemented remediation strategies.

IT Support Company - IT Specialist (2015 - 2017)
- Provided technical support to end-users.
- Maintained the company's IT infrastructure.

EDUCATION:
University of Maryland - Master's in Cybersecurity (2015)

CERTIFICATIONS:
CompTIA Security+
Certified Ethical Hacker
